author: Matthew Brand
title: Pattern discovery via entropy minimization
venue: MERL -- A MITSUBISHI ELECTRIC RESEARCH LABORATORY
window: occupant. An HMM conventionally estimated from the same initial conditions is fully connected and thus too bushy to profitably illustrate or interpret.
